products.name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
products.description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and superior sound quality.

products.description: Track your health and fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch featuring heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life.

products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Double-wall vacuum insulated bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

products.name: Yoga Mat Premium
